metadata.title: CVE-2023-46727 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 10.0.0 and prior to version 10.0.11, GLPI inventory endpoint can beused to drive a SQL injection attack. Version 10.0.11 contains a patch forthe issue. As a workaround, disable native inventory.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
